NAEB EDUCATIONAL TELEVISION MANAGEMENT SEMINAR
AUerton Park, August 19-25
1957
The NAEB Is planning to conduct a Research Seminar at Ohio State
University, probably In December, 1957. Your answers to the ques¬
tions below will be helpful to the planning committee In making the
Research Seminar successful. Will you please fill In sometime dur¬
ing the Management Seminar and return to Harold H1U before you
leave AUerton?
